backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing contact form and service request submission with validation, storage in maps keyed by email/timestamp, and query functions to retrieve all contacts and service requests sorted by timestamp.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four LG branding features covering logo replacement, comprehensive theme application, background/border updates, and icon/badge styling across frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing LG-branded components, hooks, styling with LG Heritage Red (#A50034), and service center page structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with neutral grays and whites for backgrounds, borders, and text colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the 24x7 Care Customer Support Interface application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering Header, ServiceCenterPage, and Footer in a flex column layout with background styling.
frontend/src/components/ApplianceCategor: Responsive grid displaying six appliance categories with icons, descriptions, and click handlers that scroll to the service form with hover effects using primary color accents.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form card component with name, email, and message fields, client-side validation, mutation hook for backend submission, and cancel/success callbacks with primary color focus states.
frontend/src/components/ContactInfo.tsx: Three-column grid displaying contact details (phone, email, location) in cards with primary-colored icons and hover shadow effects.
frontend/src/components/FAQ.tsx: Accordion component displaying five frequently asked questions about service turnaround, warranty, coverage areas, costs, and scheduling with primary color hover states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer component displaying copyright information for LG Electronics and a link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on the current hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders a header component with the LG Electronics logo, a wrench icon, and the tagline "Life's Good".
Displays a grid of four service feature cards (24/7 Support, Certified Technicians, Genuine Parts, Warranty Service) with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ServiceRequestFo: Provides a form for submitting service requests with fields for appliance type, model number, issue description, customer name, and email, with success message handling and mutation integration.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMessage.t: Displays a dismissible success alert message confirming that a message has been sent successfully.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching contact forms and service requests from the backend actor, including queries for all contacts, contact by email, and all service requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRequestMuta: Provides a mutation hook for submitting service requests to the backend actor and invalidating the service requests query cache on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using LG Heritage Red (#A50034) as the primary brand color.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceCenterPage.tsx: Main landing page component that renders a hero section and multiple sections including appliance categories, service features, request form, FAQ, and contact information.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking LG-branded service center features, known issues (incorrect LG logo), and image requirements for official LG logo with specific dimensions.
